name: Qon
description:
Made in Unity3D version 2017.1 - 2017.2, in about 5-6 days. I used ChipTone for the sound effects, and I spent a couple minutes in Bosca Ceoil for the music. Since there were no relevant game jams for me to participate in-- and I'm not yet at the skill level to do it in those time limits-- I made this according to my own personal goals I though I could achieve. 

I hope you enjoy!

Notes:

If you are to play this game, I only ask that you tell me what you think of it in the comments, and let me know of any issues or questions you might have. And remember: if you find any sort of bug or problem, let me know about it and how I could recreate it, so I can make my first game the highest quality that I can achieve. 

Also send me a screenshot of your high score!
